{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Intel |model = Centrino Advanced-N 6235 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = 6235ANNGW |page_start_date = January 20, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Intel_Centrino_Advanced-N_6235_(6235ANNGW) |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = M.2 |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PD96235ANNG,PD96235ANNGU |icid = 1000M-6235ANNG,1000M-6235ANNGU |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |ethoui = |chip1 = Intel;L232NA31; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = Bluetooth, DFS, |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/17/2013 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 6235ANNGW - standard
6235ANNGU - BIOS locked (presumably for Lenovo and HP, likely via SS) :1000M-6235ANNGU "JP2 MCP NGFF A1", "G80132-001", and the '''[[Intel]]''' logo is silkscreened on the back of the board in the FCC photos. :The single '''[[Intel]]''' IC package on the board is marked "i(M)(C)11", "L232NA31", and "QQ9VES". [[Category:English Documentation]]
